description:
I've tried to use neochat, but it occasionally runs into situations where it just freezes. I assume there's some sort of hangup in regards to the syncing process, but this should just freeze the app.

Unfortunately, I think I'm going to go back to element. It consumes more memory but I don't run into basic usability issues with it. Also, the dark theme needs a lot of work
Até o momento é o cliente matrix mais bem polído e rico em funcinalidades. Só podia ser do projeto KDE mesmo.
summary: É o melhor cliente Matrix que temos atualmente

description: It's beautiful and integrates well with KDE Plasma. It supports spaces and multiple accounts. It does everything I need!

the app doesn't seem to launch at all
maybe its on snap's side or kde's side
either way this is unacceptable on running Kubuntu LTS 22.04

Entering virtually any matrix room that isn't public and it just says "build libquotient with encryption enabled to send encrypted messages"

That's cool and all, but no other client so far that I've used requires me to rebuild it to use it.
I tried to use this app after installing it on Fedora Kinoite and it get stuck on the loading screen and cannot get any further.
Using the flatpak version, this application appears to work flawlessly for me, allowing me to connect to a matrix.org account, verify with other devices and send/receive encrypted messages.
Der Klient unterstütz nicht mal ende zu es
Tolles Layout, reagiert gut und fühlt sich super an in der Bedienung. Das Projekt ist noch sehr neu, weswegen viele Features noch fehlen, aber einen besseren Anfang kann man fast nicht hinlegen.

Eigentlich ein guter Matrixclient, besonders wenn KDE Plasma als Desktop zum Einsatz kommt da er sich hier perfekt integriert. Die App läuft außerdem spürbar schneller als Element. Leider wird aktuell keine Ende zu Ende-Verschlüsselung unterstützt. Da alle meine Matrixchats verschlüsselt sind ist NeoChat für mich momentan leider unbrauchbar.
Leider stürzt die App direkt nach dem Start ab.
Hatte die erst vor kurzem enteckt. Funktioniert besser als das Origenal. Vielen Danke
